name: WP REST API Demo
description: Just another WP API Demo Sites site

context.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

after.description: Limit response to posts published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

author.description: Limit result set to posts assigned to specific authors.

author_exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes posts assigned to specific authors.

before.description: Limit response to posts published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

include.description: Limit result set to specific IDs.

offset.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

slug.description: Limit result set to posts with one or more specific slugs.

status.description: Limit result set to posts assigned one or more statuses.

categories.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the categories taxonomy.

categories_exclude.description: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the categories taxonomy.

tags.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the tags taxonomy.

tags_exclude.description: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the tags taxonomy.

sticky.description: Limit result set to items that are sticky.

date.description: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone.

date_gmt.description: The date the object was published, as GMT.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the object unique to its type.

status.description: A named status for the object.

password.description: A password to protect access to the content and excerpt.

author.description: The ID for the author of the object.

featured_media.description: The ID of the featured media for the object.

comment_status.description: Whether or not comments are open on the object.

ping_status.description: Whether or not the object can be pinged.

sticky.description: Whether or not the object should be treated as sticky.

template.description: The theme file to use to display the object.

categories.description: The terms assigned to the object in the category taxonomy.

tags.description: The terms assigned to the object in the post_tag taxonomy.

liveblog_likes.description: The number of Liveblog Likes the post has.

date_gmt.description: The date the object was published, as GMT.

guid.description: The globally unique identifier for the object.

raw.description: GUID for the object, as it exists in the database.

rendered.description: GUID for the object, transformed for display.

modified.description: The date the object was last modified, in the site's timezone.

modified_gmt.description: The date the object was last modified, as GMT.

status.description: A named status for the object.

type.description: Type of Post for the object.

protected.description: Whether the content is protected with a password.

rendered.description: HTML excerpt for the object, transformed for display.

protected.description: Whether the excerpt is protected with a password.

featured_media.description: The ID of the featured media for the object.

comment_status.description: Whether or not comments are open on the object.

ping_status.description: Whether or not the object can be pinged.

sticky.description: Whether or not the object should be treated as sticky.

template.description: The theme file to use to display the object.

tags.description: The terms assigned to the object in the post_tag taxonomy.

include.description: Limit result set to specific IDs.

offset.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

slug.description: Limit result set to users with a specific slug.

roles.description: Limit result set to users matching at least one specific role provided. Accepts csv list or single role.

email.description: The email address for the user.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the user.

capabilities.description: All capabilities assigned to the user.

extra_capabilities.description: Any extra capabilities assigned to the user.

24.description: Avatar URL with image size of 24 pixels.

48.description: Avatar URL with image size of 48 pixels.

96.description: Avatar URL with image size of 96 pixels.

context.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

email.description: The email address for the user.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the user.

force.description: Required to be true, as users do not support trashing.

reassign.description: Reassign the deleted user's posts and links to this user ID.

context.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

after.description: Limit response to comments published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

author.description: Limit result set to comments assigned to specific user IDs. Requires authorization.

author_exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes comments assigned to specific user IDs. Requires authorization.

author_email.description: Limit result set to that from a specific author email. Requires authorization.

before.description: Limit response to comments published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

include.description: Limit result set to specific IDs.

offset.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

parent.description: Limit result set to comments of specific parent IDs.

parent_exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific parent IDs.

post.description: Limit result set to comments assigned to specific post IDs.

status.description: Limit result set to comments assigned a specific status. Requires authorization.

type.description: Limit result set to comments assigned a specific type. Requires authorization.

password.description: The password for the post if it is password protected.

author.description: The ID of the user object, if author was a user.

author_email.description: Email address for the object author.

author_ip.description: IP address for the object author.

author_name.description: Display name for the object author.

author_user_agent.description: User agent for the object author.

date.description: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone.

date_gmt.description: The date the object was published, as GMT.

parent.description: The ID for the parent of the object.

post.description: The ID of the associated post object.

status.description: State of the object.

author.description: The ID of the user object, if author was a user.

author_email.description: Email address for the object author.

author_ip.description: IP address for the object author.

author_name.description: Display name for the object author.

author_user_agent.description: User agent for the object author.

raw.description: Content for the object, as it exists in the database.

rendered.description: HTML content for the object, transformed for display.

date.description: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone.

date_gmt.description: The date the object was published, as GMT.

parent.description: The ID for the parent of the object.

post.description: The ID of the associated post object.

status.description: State of the object.

type.description: Type of Comment for the object.

author_avatar_urls.description: Avatar URLs for the object author.

timezone.description: A city in the same timezone as you.

date_format.description: A date format for all date strings.

time_format.description: A time format for all time strings.

start_of_week.description: A day number of the week that the week should start on.

use_smilies.description: Convert emoticons like :-) and :-P to graphics on display.

default_ping_status.description: Allow link notifications from other blogs (pingbacks and trackbacks) on new articles.

default_comment_status.description: Allow people to post comments on new articles.
